description: A spotlight on the people reshaping our politics. A conversation with voters across the country. And a guiding hand through the endless news cycle, telling you what you really need to know.
title: On Politics With Lisa Lerer Newsletter
title_page: On Politics With Lisa Lerer Newsletter - The New York Times
text:
A spotlight on the people reshaping our politics. A conversation with voters across the country. And a guiding hand through the endless news cycle, telling you what you really need to know.
